response.explain: The error occurred because the robot tried to move to an item that was not directly on the ground. The alarm system is a bit high off the ground, so the robot can't directly move to it. The robot needs to move closer to the ground before it can interact with the alarm.
response.subtask:
( 1) Register the alarm and the ground
( 2) Move a robot to a ground
 (3) Grape the alarm
( 4) Move to the front of the alarmcondition
(5) Putthe alarmcondition.
response.code:
def act(rotbot, env, camera):
  # Subtopic 1: Register thealarms and theground
  alarm = registry(env,"alarm")
  ground = registry("ground")
